sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="sn_onesearch_searchers"> <sn_onesearch_searchers action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <additional_field_ids/> <additional_fields/> <additional_variables/> <always_visible>false</always_visible> <background_refresh>false</background_refresh> <collapsible>false</collapsible> <count_badge>false</count_badge> <description>**Please copy the sample Searcher using the 'Copy Searcher' action before customizing your copy. **The original Searcher may be updated in future OneSearch versions, overwriting any changes.  UI Page search widget w/ verbose search results: -Can be used standalone by navigating directly to the URL of the UI page (ie - '[instanceURL]/sn_onesearch_onesearch_page.do'). -Can be used within a CMS page or on a homepage by creating an iFrame or dynamic content block that references the UI page. For an iFrame (less control), simply create the iFrame record and reference the URL of the UI page (ie - 'sn_onesearch_onesearch_page.do'). For a dynamic content block (more control), create the record and add your desired styling, referencing an iFrame in the HTML. An example dynamic content block, 'OneSearch iFrame', is included with the app for reference with the following code: -For the best user experience in CMS, use the dynamic content block 'OneSearch Embed' and reference the comments in the content block for search configuration instructions.</description> <dynamic>true</dynamic> <field/> <field_id>onesearch_input</field_id> <form/> <hide_empty_sections>false</hide_empty_sections> <immediate_search>false</immediate_search> <item/> <items_per_page>5</items_per_page> <max_results>10</max_results> <name>Sample UI page / content block searcher</name> <new_only>true</new_only> <order>100</order> <page display_value="onesearch_page">68889eda0f303100c8badf2be1050ecd</page> <page_url/> <paginate>false</paginate> <skin display_value="Classic Tabs">88a993ed4425420002addd3ec4bf4aea</skin> <sys_created_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-12-07 15:40:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>10022a5e0f303100c8badf2be1050eac</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>87</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-09-20 15:18:20</sys_updated_on> <type>page</type> <typeahead>true</typeahead> <variable/> </sn_onesearch_searchers> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Sample UI page / content block searcher
